snippet: The National Security Agency is reviewing its decision to allow a top official to work part time for a cybersecurity firm that is pitching its services to the financial sector, the agency said on Friday....

headline.print_headline: NSA Reviewing Official's Part-Time Private Work
headline.main: NSA Reviewing Official's Part-Time Private Work

lead_paragraph: The National Security Agency is reviewing its decision to allow a top official to work part time for a cybersecurity firm that is pitching its services to the financial sector, the agency said on Friday.
